sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card>
      <v-card-title class="justify-center text-h5 font-weight-bold text-center">{{ title }}</v-card-title>
      <v-card-subtitle class="justify-center text-center text-subtitle-1 font-weight-bold">{{ subtitle }}</v-card-subtitle>
      <v-card-text>
        <v-progress-circular
        class="mx-auto"
          :value="value"
          :color="color"
          :size="100"
          :width="10"
        >
          {{ value }}%
        </v-progress-circular>
      </v-card-text>
    </v-card>
</template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    props: {
      title: String,
      subtitle: String,
      value: Number,
      color: String,
    },
  };
  </script>
